participant_1.background:
Helping people and trying new things are two of my favorite things to do.
I like the feeling of being in shape and being able to do well in races.
i am hoping to move to australia soon to marry my boyfriend.
my favorite fruit is an apple.
my mother is a dentist.

participant_2.background:
I eat a slice of my favorite pizza to cheer up.
i cannot stand clutter or dust.
I'm a teacher who enjoys baking, but keeps it a secret from my parents.
i enjoy taking late night walks when it s completely dark.
My sisters are visiting this weekend, so I am looking forward to spending time with them and making new memories.

content.text: I am doing well, thanks for asking! How are you?
I am doing well too! Thanks for asking. I am excited to be meeting new people.
I am excited to meet new people too! I am a teacher and I love meeting my students.
That is wonderful! I am hoping to move to Australia soon to marry my boyfriend.
That is exciting! I have always wanted to visit Australia. What do you like about it there?
I love the culture and the people. I also love the food. What do you like to do for fun?
I enjoy baking, but I keep it a secret from my parents. I also enjoy taking late night walks when it is completely dark.
That is interesting! I have never been baking, but I have always wanted to try it. I love taking walks too!
It is really fun! You should try it sometime. It is a great way to relax and de-stress.
I will definitely try it sometime! I am glad we are meeting! I am looking forward to getting to know you better.
I am glad we are meeting too! I am looking forward to getting to know you better too!
